entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 26. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 35 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 14.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming west 30 km/h late in the morning then light in the afternoon. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 36 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 17 in the evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 25 February 2023
